tool_description: Analyzes the emotional sentiment of customer feedback, providing sentiment classification and intensity scores to complement other classification results.

feedback_texts.description: Array of feedback texts to analyze for sentiment

include_intensity.description: Whether to include sentiment intensity scores

error_messages: Empty feedback array: Provide at least one feedback text for sentiment analysis.
Unsupported sentiment scale: Use three_point or five_point for sentiment_scale.
Sentiment analysis failed: Unable to analyze sentiment for one or more feedback texts.
usage: Provide feedback_texts array and configure sentiment_scale and include_intensity options. Returns sentiment classifications and intensity scores.

emotion_indicators.description: Primary emotion detected in each feedback
